name: HaruEncoder.getByteType
purpose: Get the type of the byte in the text

return.description:
Returns the type of the byte in the text on the specified position.
   The result is one of the following values:
   
    
     HaruEncoder::BYTE_TYPE_SINGLE - single byte
     character. 
    
    
     HaruEncoder::BYTE_TYPE_LEAD - lead byte of a
     double-byte character.
    
    
     HaruEncoder::BYTE_TYPE_TRAIL - trailing byte of a
     double-byte character.
    
    
     HaruEncoder::BYTE_TYPE_UNKNOWN - invalid encoder or
     cannot detect the byte type.
